叢雲剣: (むらくものつるぎ) - Murakumo no Tsurugi (alternate name for Ama-no-Murakumo no Tsurugi; the sword of the Imperial regalia)
口: (kou/ku/boca) - mouth , mouth; opening, hole, gap, orifice; mouth (of a bottle), spout, nozzle, mouthpiece; gate, door, entrance, exit
口々: (くちぐち) - each entrance; every mouth
口うら: (くちうら) - (esp. 口裏) determining a speaker's true or hidden meaning/determining a speaker's intentions from his manner of speech; (esp. 口占) divining good or bad luck from listening to someone
口うらを合わせる: (くちうらをあわせる) - to arrange beforehand to tell the same story; to get the stories straight
口うるさい: (くちうるさい) - nagging; faultfinding; carping; captious
口から漏れる: (くちからもれる) - to pass from one's lips
口から砂糖が出る: (くちからさとうがでる) - sickly sweet
口がうまい: (くちがうまい) - honeymouthed; glib; fair-spoken; cajoling; talking glibly
口がかかる: (くちがかかる) - to be summoned (i.e. of a geisha, by a customer); (usu. as 〜の口が掛かる) to be offered (the job of ...)/to be invited (to do ...)
口がかたい: (くちがかたい) - (ant: 口が軽い) tight-lipped; able to keep a secret
口がかるい: (くちがかるい) - (ant: 口が堅い) having a loose tongue; being talkative; speaking without thinking; being unable to keep a secret
口がすべる: (くちがすべる) - to make a slip of the tongue; to let something slip
口がたつ: (くちがたつ) - to be eloquent; to have a way with words
口がわるい: (くちがわるい) - sarcastic; having a sharp tongue; having a sharp nasty tongue
口が上手い: (くちがうまい) - honeymouthed; glib; fair-spoken; cajoling; talking glibly
口が堅い: (くちがかたい) - (ant: 口が軽い) tight-lipped; able to keep a secret
口が多い: (くちがおおい) - talkative/loquacious/garrulous/voluble; having a large family to support/having too many mouths to feed
口が巧い: (くちがうまい) - honeymouthed; glib; fair-spoken; cajoling; talking glibly
口が悪い: (くちがわるい) - sarcastic; having a sharp tongue; having a sharp nasty tongue
口が掛かる: (くちがかかる) - to be summoned (i.e. of a geisha, by a customer); (usu. as 〜の口が掛かる) to be offered (the job of ...)/to be invited (to do ...)
口が曲がる: (くちがまがる) - to incur the wrath of god (e.g. by speaking ill of somebody behind their back)/to get into trouble; to warp one's mouth
口が減らない: (くちがへらない) - fast-talking; always having another argument ready; not able to keep one's mouth shut; never at a loss for words
口が滑る: (くちがすべる) - to make a slip of the tongue; to let something slip
口が立つ: (くちがたつ) - to be eloquent; to have a way with words
口が肥える: (くちがこえる) - to be used to eating the best; to have a refined palate
口が裂けても: (くちがさけても) - (I) won't (say) anything no matter what (expression is followed by negative verb relating to say, answer, etc.) to not (tell) even under any threat
口が裂けても言えない: (くちがさけてもいえない) - (I) won't say anything no matter what; to be unwilling to tell even under threat
口が軽い: (くちがかるい) - (ant: 口が堅い) having a loose tongue; being talkative; speaking without thinking; being unable to keep a secret
口が辷る: (くちがすべる) - to make a slip of the tongue; to let something slip
口が過ぎる: (くちがすぎる) - to say something better left unsaid; to go too far (by saying something rude)
口が酸っぱくなる: (くちがすっぱくなる) - to say the same thing over and over again; to talk until one is blue in the face
口きき: (くちきき) - mediation/good offices/intervention/mediator/middleman; influential person/person of influence; eloquence/eloquent person; (original meaning) way of speaking
口ぐせ: (くちぐせ) - way of saying; favorite phrase; favourite phrase
口ごもる: (くちごもる) - to hesitate to say; to mumble; to hem and haw; to falter
口さがない: (くちさがない) - gossipy; abusive; critical; jabbering
口さき: (くちさき) - lip service/mere words/professions; lips/mouth/snout/proboscis
口ずさむ: (くちずさむ) - to hum; to sing to oneself; to compose impromptu (poems)
口だし: (くちだし) - interference; meddling; butting in
口つき: (くちつき) - (in the shape of a) mouth; mouthpiece (of a cigarette); manner of speech
口では大阪の城も建つ: (くちではおおさかのしろもたつ) - easier said than done; talking is easy; building Osaka Castle with one's mouth
口でやる: (くちでやる) - to carry out fellatio; to give someone head
口にあう: (くちにあう) - to be palatable; to suit one's taste
口にする: (くちにする) - to taste/to eat; to speak of/to refer to
口にのぼる: (くちにのぼる) - to become the subject of rumours or conversations
口にチャック: (くちにチャック) - zip it (when used to others); I'll shut up (when used by oneself); button (one's) lips
口に上せる: (くちにのぼせる) - to talk about (something)
口に上る: (くちにのぼる) - to become the subject of rumours or conversations
口に乗る: (くちにのる) - to be a topic of conversation/to be made much of; to be taken in
口に入いる: (くちにはいる) - to ingest/to eat/to enter the mouth; to be able to eat
口に入る: (くちにはいる) - to ingest/to eat/to enter the mouth; to be able to eat
口に出す: (くちにだす) - to put into words; to express
口に合う: (くちにあう) - to be palatable; to suit one's taste
口に含む: (くちにふくむ) - to hold in one's mouth (without biting, before chewing or swallowing, etc.)
口に蜜有り腹に剣有り: (くちにみつありはらにけんあり) - A honey tongue, a heart of gall
口に運ぶ: (くちにはこぶ) - to put into the mouth; to eat
口のうまい: (くちのうまい) - honeymouthed; glib; fair-spoken
口のかたい: (くちのかたい) - tight-lipped; able to keep a secret
口のきき方: (くちのききかた) - the way one talks; one's way of speaking
口のわるい: (くちのわるい) - sarcastic; foulmouthed; having a sharp tongue; having a sharp nasty tongue
口の上手い: (くちのうまい) - honeymouthed; glib; fair-spoken
口の利き方: (くちのききかた) - the way one talks; one's way of speaking
口の効き方: (くちのききかた) - the way one talks; one's way of speaking
口の堅い: (くちのかたい) - tight-lipped; able to keep a secret
口の悪い: (くちのわるい) - sarcastic; foulmouthed; having a sharp tongue; having a sharp nasty tongue
口の減らない: (くちのへらない) - always having a comeback (often used derogatorily); fast-talking
口は禍の元: (くちはわざわいのもと) - Out of the mouth comes evil
口ばかり: (くちばかり) - all talk (and no action)
口ばっかり: (くちばっかり) - all talk (and no action)
口ぶり: (くちぶり) - way of speaking; intimation
口べた: (くちべた) - defective speech; slowness of speech; poor talker; tongue-tied person
口べらし: (くちべらし) - giving up children for adoption or apprenticeship, etc. (out of poverty); reducing the number of mouths
口ほどにもない: (くちほどにもない) - all bark and no bite; unable to live up to one's claims
口ほどにも無い: (くちほどにもない) - all bark and no bite; unable to live up to one's claims
口もと: (くちもと) - mouth/lips; shape of the mouth; near an entrance/vicinity of an entrance
口をかける: (くちをかける) - to talk/to call/to invite; to call a geisha or prostitute over
口をきく: (くちをきく) - to speak/to utter; to mediate
口をすっぱくして言う: (くちをすっぱくしていう) - to say time and time again; to say till you're blue in the face
口をそろえる: (くちをそろえる) - (usu. as 口をそろえて) to speak unanimously; to speak in chorus; to speak in unison; to speak in one voice
口をだす: (くちをだす) - to interrupt a conversation
